AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: air mage
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Born with an affinity towards the storm, [PAWN_nameDef] quickly mastered control over air, and eventually became a highly skilled air mage. [PAWN_nameDef] created impenetrable vortexes of wind, sending anyone caught within flying into the sea.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lightning mage
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Born with an affinity towards the storm, [PAWN_nameDef] quickly mastered control over lightning, and eventually became a highly skilled lightning mage. [PAWN_nameDef] rained bolts of lightning at [PAWN_pronoun] foes, and took no prisoners.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: water mage
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: Born with an affinity towards the storm, [PAWN_nameDef] quickly mastered control over water, and eventually became a highly skilled water mage. [PAWN_nameDef] would turn once calm water into a maze of waves, sending enemy ships plunging into the depths.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: snake mage
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While most scoff at the idea of a snake mage, those that have actually encountered one will rarely be found laughing. [PAWN_nameDef] had such great control over sea serpents, that [PAWN_pronoun] could sink entire fleets within seconds.
